definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: perversity, perverse thing (only Pr exc. De 32:20)—Pl. abs. [[תַּהְפֻּכוֹת]] De 32:20 + 8 t.; cstr. id. Pr 2:14; —perverse things, particularly utterances Pr 2:12, Pr 10:32, Pr 23:33, cf. ´[[פִּי ת]] Pr 8:13, ´[[לְשׁוֹן ת]] Pr 10:31, and even ´[[אִישׁ ת]] Pr 16:28 (‖[[נִרְגׇּן]] slanderer); but also thoughts, devices Pr 6:14, Pr 16:30; ´[[דּוֹר ת]] De 32:20 = perverse generation, (‖[[לאׁ־אֵמֻן בָּם]]), [[רָָע]] ´[[ת]] Pr 2:14 (‖[[עֲשׂוֹת רָָע]]).
